value.description: An old document containing the coordinates of a stargate located somewhere on the planet.
A kit containing all of the pre-assembled materials needed to install an iris into a stargate.

A complex device capable of connecting to a planet’s skipgate network. It is far too fragile and primitive to handle the network’s “currents” so it tends to completely fall apart after a single trip.

Warning: It is advised to move to a safe distance after establishing a connection with another stargate.

Warning: When travelling back it is advised to make a new connection, entering through an “exit” may result in the item or person being violently torn apart on a molecular level by the skipgate network’s currents.

A complex device capable of connecting to a planet’s skipgate network. It is tough enough to withstand the network's aggressive “currents”, making multiple trips possible.

Warning: It is advised to move to a safe distance after establishing a connection with another stargate.

Warning: When travelling back it is advised to make a new connection, entering through an “exit” may result in the item or person being violently torn apart on a molecular level by the skipgate network’s currents.

A strange archotech device capable of connecting to a planet’s skipgate network and possibly even beyond..

Warning: It is advised to move to a safe distance after establishing a connection with another stargate.

Warning: When travelling back it is advised to make a new connection, entering through an “exit” may result in the item or person being violently torn apart on a molecular level by the skipgate network’s currents.
Build a complex device capable of utilizing a local skipgate network to allow for quick travel.
Build a more advanced and tougher stargate that allows for multiple trips.
Use the advanced plasteel alloys to construct a barrier, also known as an iris, that prevents anyone from entering or exiting through the stargate.
